activities: Clarifai provides a website, software and mobile applications that permits people or businesses to search, tag and optimize their images. Certain Clarifai services may also be accessed by Application Programming Interfaces (APIs). Some Clarifai services are free of charge and others are paid. Clarifai also offers a service called forEVERY that lets people manage and share their photos and videos. Clarifai collects personal information from individuals in EU member states and Switzerland for the purposes of providing and improving these services, entering into contracts, providing customer support, and enforcing its Terms of Service. Clarifai also collects personal information from employees to provide human resources services, to comply with applicable laws, and to provide internal security services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: General Science & Technology - (GST)Information Services - (INF)Computer Services - (CSV)Computer Software - (CSF)
personaldata: Online and offline customer/ user data and employee data which may be manually processed
privacyprograms: self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy principles
